content: c2c half_double_crochet stitch wash cloth by carolyn calderon the c2c half_double_crochet stitch wash cloth is a very beautiful design to make in the corner-to-corner technique it is made with the slip_stitch and half_double_crochet stitches with a few chains in there too this makes a wonderful addition to your home or a beautiful gift this is part of the relax & refresh wash cloth crochet along i used bernat softee baby cotton #3 for the smaller size and sugar n cream #4 for the larger size includes written instructions in us terminology please see pattern website for details and video tutorials on how to make the stitch thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
